resources.string:
Pi Locker is a simple and fast locksreen replacement with Customizability and Smart Gestures. 

 Features : 
 
-Clean interface 
-Light weight 
-Ram friendly 
-Smooth on low end devices 
-Customizable text 
-Customizable text color 
-Battery percent 
-Lockscreen Gestures 
-Changeable background image 
-Changeable background color 
-Emergengy unlock 
-Show/Hide statusbar 
-Pin security 
-Password security



 ChangeLog : 

 v3.0 
-Fixed onboot start 
-Changed font size 
-Added Pin and password Security 
-Fixed Home button in some devices 
-Changed Battery and custom text position 
-increased default background transperancy 
-Code Cleaned 
-Removed unused recources 
-added text limiter in password
